title: The Scandal Of The Century (Ep 1418)
description:
In this episode, I discuss yesterday’s bombshell release of new texts about the plot to take down Trump. 

News Picks:

Joe Biden thinks his son Hunter is really smart. 


Newly revealed texts show that the FBI was investigating Trump before the opening of Crossfire Hurricane.

Stunning newly revealed FBI texts show the FBI knew key components of the collusion hoax were false.

The collusion hoax was always about protecting Hillary from her email scandal.
